title: NBA week 17 summary, week 18 predictions
content:
We went 35 for 56 this past week, 62.5% accuracy. Just one fewer correct game than last week. New predictions are up, and point-spread details of the past week are given below.

Point spread # games Accuracy
< 6 9 56%
5-10 30 63%
11-15 8 50%
>15 9 78%
